ASK_STYLE: A blend of Crayon Shin-chan’s naïve cartoon line and van Gogh’s bold, impasto colorism, with expressive, childlike energy and vibrant, non-natural hues.
STYLE_RESPONSE:
{
  "STYLE_BRIEF": {
    "FORM_COMPOSITION": "Asymmetrical balance with dynamic diagonals, fragmented forms, and overlapping planes creating visual tension; structured yet loose spatial organization.",

    "BRUSHWORK_TECHNIQUE": "Loose, gestural strokes with visible impasto texture; layered glazes and broken brushmarks to convey movement and emotional intensity.",

  "CONFIDENCE": 0.92

  "QUESTIONS": [
